name: PeakQuest
description: A high-performance alpine shoe with integrated crampons and powerful grip, making it ideal for technical climbing and icy mountain terrain.

name: TrailTrekker
description: A versatile hiking shoe with a durable and breathable mesh upper, flexible sole, and responsive cushioning for comfort and support on a variety of terrains.

name: FlowTraverse
description: A waterproof trail shoe with a lightweight and nimble design, designed to offer comfort and stability during running on uneven surfaces.

name: Roamer
description: The Wildfire Roamer Trail Shoe is a durable hiking shoe with a breathable mesh upper, rubber outsole for traction, EVA midsole for support and comfort, and reinforced toe cap for protection. Ideal for off-road adventures.

name: TrekTote
description: A compact backpack with a waterproof main compartment and a roll-top closure, perfect for water sports and outdoor activities in wet environments.

name: SummitStrider
description: A large, mountaineering backpack with an adjustable frame, padded hip belt, and ample storage space for gear and supplies needed for extended outdoor adventures.

name: TrailSeeker
description: A compact backpack with a waterproof main compartment and a roll-top closure, perfect for water sports and outdoor activities in wet environments.

name: TrailBlazer
description: A lightweight backpack with multiple pockets and attachment points for gear and hydration, designed for day hikes and trail running.

name: SummitShield
description: A high-performance mountaineering jacket with a waterproof and breathable Gore-Tex shell, adjustable hood and cuffs, and multiple pockets for gear.

name: TrailBlaze
description: A lightweight and breathable hiking jacket with moisture-wicking fabric, ventilated panels, and adjustable features for optimal comfort and protection.

name: Ridgeback
description: A high-performance mountaineering jacket with a waterproof and breathable Gore-Tex shell, adjustable hood and cuffs, and multiple pockets for gear.

name: Mountaineer
description: A lightweight and breathable hiking jacket with moisture-wicking fabric, ventilated panels, and adjustable features for optimal comfort and protection.

name: Pathfinder
description: A lightweight and breathable hiking jacket with moisture-wicking fabric, ventilated panels, and adjustable features for optimal comfort and protection.

name: NordicExplorer
description: A lightweight and packable shell jacket that's perfect for alpine climbing and mountaineering. Made with a waterproof and breathable membrane, this jacket features pit zips for ventilation and a removable hood.

name: DesertExplorer
description: A lightweight and breathable jacket that's perfect for warm weather adventures. Made with moisture-wicking materials, this jacket features mesh ventilation and a zippered chest pocket.

name: MountainMajesty
description: A warm and stylish parka that's perfect for winter adventures. Made with wind-resistant and water-repellent materials, this jacket features a faux-fur trimmed hood and multiple pockets for storage.

name: ForestRanger
description: A waterproof and breathable jacket that's perfect for rainy days on the trail. Made with sealed seams and adjustable cuffs, this jacket features a hood and a zippered chest pocket.
